channel.title: Comments on: How’s That Being Clever Working Out for Ya?

item.title: By: Erunamo
item.dc:creator: Erunamo
item.description: I don't understand why there is such a market for this crap. It's a GAME. Yet apparently there are those that would advance their characters in this fashion.
item.content:encoded: I don’t understand why there is such a market for this crap. It’s a GAME. Yet apparently there are those that would advance their characters in this fashion.

item.title: By: OGHC
item.dc:creator: OGHC
item.description: Well, they are smart little buggers, I'll give them that. The whole gold mining industry in WoW just cracks me up. Who could have predicted THAT one?
item.content:encoded: Well, they are smart little buggers, I’ll give them that. The whole gold mining industry in WoW just cracks me up. Who could have predicted THAT one?
